snippet.title: Trick or Treat gameplay (PC Game, 1994)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Trick or Treat, Dos PC game produced by ACA Soft S.L. in 1994 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/trick-or-treat/8303/
Trick or Treat is a decent adventure games, created at mid 90'. The plot is nothing special, you play a young man who has just found a new job on October 31, after an car accident.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Igor - https://youtu.be/wZ7sIw9gkTk
Freddy Pharkas: Frontier Pharmacist - https://youtu.be/xoCLtT95BC4
Simon the Sorcerer 2 - https://youtu.be/y5Fgw5n8aFM
